title: Kabal

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-**Hook Toss:** Select two targets. The first target will be redirected into the second. You do not learn their role
-**Spinning Dash:** Dash at a player. This resolves immediately. Your target will be confused, and will target themselves and their two closest living neighbors, even if they’re only capable of one visit. (1 night cooldown)
-**Pick Up Speed:** Make it so all the Kombatant member’s actions resolve instantly, as well as it going through protective roles. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -You will use Hook Toss on the first attacker that attacks instead of your original target. They will be redirected into your second target if using hook grab, otherwise, they will be tossed into a random non-Kombatant player

fields.name: X-RAY:
fields.value: ** Lose the cooldown on Spinning Dash and have the target visit their closest alive neighbors closest alive neighbor (eg 3 is targeted, they will visit 1-5). Hook Toss now also does a basic attack to the first target.
